Shock Absorber Suspension

The Shock Absorber Suspension is a critical component designed to absorb and dissipate the energy generated during a fall, protecting both the user and the structure. It ensures the vertical lifeline system remains safe and reliable under sudden load conditions.

  • Standard: EN 795 : 2012
  • Material: AISI 304 / 304L / 316
  • Allowable Working Load: 12 kN
  • Breaking Strength: 25 kN
  • Component Code: HVLC-03
